title: Problems League and I face
body:
Since I downloaded patch 7.14, the client started lagging a lot and some bugs happened during the game - especially when when changing the movement direction.
   The second problem is that some champions are really op - such as Miss Fortune and Syndra - that must become weaker. 
   Finally I don't think that reports will effect the reported summoner I don't know why, but some summoners make big mistakes. Some of these mistakes:
*garen taking clarity in aram
*taking the healing icon in aram although they have full health and mana
*leaving afk and not being punished 
And a lot more...
   Please riot I know you can't fix the problem mentioned in the last point but try doing something with the first or second point.

replies.body:
It's a little hard to try and troubleshoot those bugs without knowing exactly what's going on, but you could start troubleshooting that lag by doing a quick checkup on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

Issues like champion balance can be addressed by posting them over in [**Gameplay**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance) and you'll be able to get more feedback from the community there as well.
